A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
First off the bad things: Rose is an awful character and brings the film down a level\, the whole casino planet sequence was terrible except from DJ\, and there are some really dumb/irritating moments.

However\, these points aside it is a very enjoyable\, entertaining film that dares do to go where no Star Wars has gone before and has some of the most memorable scenes in the sagas history.
If you didn't like it first time\, like me\, watch it again and it is 10x better.

It doesn't deserve this amount of hate.
